title: Ajin Part 2: Shoutotsu
content:
"Ajin Part 2: Shoutotsu" movie is a good watch for fans of the anime. It covers the second half of the first season as well as the first few episodes of the second season, making it a comprehensive way to catch up on the story. The movie is well-animated, with intense action scenes and an engaging storyline that will keep you on the edge of your seat. The movie does an excellent job of highlighting the key events of the anime, making it an excellent choice for those who want to get a quick refresher on the series.

However, it's worth noting that the movie condensesa significant amount of content from the TV show into a two-hour time frame. As a result, some of the character development and world-building elements of the show may be lost. Watching the TV show is still the recommended way to experience the full story, but the movie is a great way to get a quick overview of the second half of the first season and the start of the second season. Overall, "Ajin Part 2: Shoutotsu" is an good movie that serves as a great recap of the main show. That is sure to impress fans of the anime, but it's best enjoyed after watching the TV series first.
